content: My work involves using a combination of computational modelling (neural network modelling), behavioural studies, and corpus analysis to investigate various aspects of language processing and how the processes are related to education, learning, and memory.
summary: My work involves using a combination of computational modelling (neural network modelling), behavioural studies, and corpus analysis to investigate various aspects of language processing and how the processes are related to education, learning, and memory.

title: A computational model of reading across development: Effects of literacy onset on language processing
